name: SpinningText
description: The Spinning Text component animates text in a circular motion with customizable speed, direction, color, and transitions for dynamic and engaging effects.

props.name: style
props.description: Custom styles for the text container.

props.name: duration
props.description: The duration of the full circular rotation animation.

props.name: reverse
props.description: Determines if the animation should rotate in reverse.

props.name: fontSize
props.description: The font size of the text being animated in rem.

props.name: radius
props.description: The radius of the circular path for the text animation.
